aspirations: I aspire to build scalable **Web & Mobile Solutions** and leverage **Data Science** to solve complex problems, helping businesses innovate through data-driven and user-centric applications.

experience.title: Data Science & Analytics Delivery Intern

projects.title: PCOS Care
projects.description: Machine Learning-Based PCOS Risk Prediction Web Application. Applied feature selection (Chi-Square, ANOVA), SMOTE, and dual-model prediction, achieving 93.75% recall with the enhanced Random Forest model. Built an end-to-end ML web app with Python, Flask API, and Streamlit, deployed and user tested.

projects.title: Carbon Footprint Tracker
projects.description: Developed a carbon footprint calculation and visualization tool that helps individuals estimate their environmental impact using activity-based emissions factors. Built interactive dashboards and automated calculations to recommend reductions in energy, transport, and lifestyle emissions.

projects.title: CV Writing Assistant
projects.description: Built an AI-powered CV analysis tool that extracts text from PDFs and uses Google's Gemini models to provide actionable, recruiter-style feedback. Features client-side PDF processing and a prompt-engineered senior recruiter persona.

projects.title: CIMA AI Study Assistant
projects.description: Generative AI Study Assistant for CIMA Operational Level exams. Built a custom RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipeline using Google's Gemini 2.0 Flash model to analyze uploaded PDF study materials with strict syllabus adherence. Features dual study modes (Explain/Solve), subject locking for E1/P1/F1, and a secure Node.js/Express backend serving a responsive React/Tailwind frontend.

projects.title: Futsal Team Recommendation
projects.description: Collaborative and Content-based Filtering Recommendation System. Developed a Flutter app that matched players to teams by skill, availability, and location, reducing team assembly time significantly. Centralized stadium booking with real-time availability, pricing, and management.

projects.title: CSR Analytics Project - Street Vendors
projects.description: Led a field survey of 16 street food vendors, uncovering critical hygiene gaps and operational inefficiencies affecting food safety and customer experience. Delivered data-driven interventions adopted by the CSR team, improving hygiene standards, resource allocation, and vendor business practices.

projects.title: Fantasy Coin Collector
projects.description: A high-performance 2D dungeon crawler built from scratch using HTML5 Canvas and Vanilla JavaScript. Features a custom-written physics engine, procedural map generation algorithms, and a particle system for visual effects. Implements the Web Audio API for real-time sound synthesis and uses LocalStorage for persistent progression, achievements, and high scores. Fully responsive with touch controls for mobile support.
